short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate during and/or after a game with piece themed gifs on the Lichess board

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Win a piece? Celebrate. Checkmate? Celebrate. Blunder? Frustratingly spam all the of them.

Celebrate enables you to celebrate with gifs directly on the board. Press any of the chess piece buttons under your game clock to trigger a 5 second celebration.

This extension is, and always will be, free. We are continuously enhancing this product based on community feedback. (contact if you have an idea you'd like implemented! :) )
